options.name: Solid Earth Starfield
options.explain:
Overall Damage +4%
Atk. Increase +245%

[Blessing of the Four Seasons]
Receive a blessing from the four seasons to reinforce yourself. 50% of the Blessing effect also applied to all party members.
- Can't stack with the same Blessing.

* Blessing of Warm Spring
 - Overall Damage +1%
* Blessing of Vibrant Summer
  - HP/MP +10% for 10 sec. every 10 sec.
options.explainDetail:

* Blessing of Vibrant Summer
  - HP/MP +10% for 10 sec. every 10 sec.

options.explain:
[Psychedelic Eyes]
Applies the following effects through Psychedelic Eyes, depending on the number of equipped Icelands equipment (2/3/5).
- Evasion +30%/+45%/+75%
- [Psychedelic Eyes] removed when attacked (Reappearance Cooldown: 30 sec.)

[Cursed Scarecrow]
Enter the Equipment Option Control key to summon a cursed scarecrow. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)
- Curses enemies within range for 30 sec.
- Curse duration +3 sec.

Attack Speed +8%
Casting Speed +12%

fixedOption.explain:
Overall Damage +8%

[Guard Counter]
Block an enemy attack with a Defense skill to Hold it for 2 sec.
- Defense Skills: Guard, Sword Barrier, Endure, Weapon Parry, Shield Defense, Divine Shield, and Gun Guard
- Applied on defense within 0.5 sec. of casting a skill.

Physical/Magical Def. +7,000
Physical/Magical damage reduction +20% when countered

fixedOption.explain:
Skill cooldown recovery +30% (Awakening skills excluded)

[Yin Yang Energy]
Attacks create an orb that grants Yin Yang Energy for 15 sec. (Cooldown: 1 sec.)
- Black Orb: Attack Speed +24% and Casting Speed +36%
- White Orb: Casts a barrier with 10% of Max HP.

Movement Speed +28%

All Elemental Damage +10

[Soul Weapon]
Basic/Jump/Dash attacks summon a Soul Weapon that deliver sword attacks.
- Sword attack count +5 when casting skills
- When sword attack count is 50, use up all count to deliver a powerful sword attack.
- The sword attack and powerful sword attack inflict 60 and 2,400% of total Atk. Increase, respectively.

Attacks Shock enemies for 10 sec. (Cooldown: 3 sec.)

Casting Speed +40%
